AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

site_name: Land To Rear Of St Andrews Yard14 St Andrew's RoadSurbitonKT6 4DT
description: Details required for Conditions 7 (Sustainability), 9 (Biodiversity), 12 (Waste and Recycling), 13 (Cycle Parking) and 15 (Construction of Management) of planning permission 21/03123/FUL (Erection of two storey self-contained dwellinghouse attached to 1 Foundry Row, St Philips Road with associated amenity space, refuse/recycling facilities and cycle storage)
decision_conditions: Due to the insufficient information submitted for Condition 13 (Cycle Parking) of planning permission 21/03123/FUL the proposal fails to ensure appropriate opportunities to promote sustainable transport, in accordance with policy T5 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS6 and DM8 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Due to the insufficient information submitted for Condition 15 (Construction Management) of planning permission 21/03123/FUL the proposal fails to safeguard the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers and the interests of the safety and operation of the highway network, in accordance with policies T4 and T7 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS7 and DM9 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
